goldenVisa.title: Golden Visa Program
goldenVisa.details: Minimum investment of €500,000 in real estate. Grants a residence permit for you and your family and provides access to the Schengen area.

rnh.title: Non-Habitual Resident (NHR)
rnh.details: Favorable tax regime for 10 years, with a fixed tax rate of 20% on eligible income and exemptions on certain foreign income.

patrimonial.title: Asset Benefits
patrimonial.details: Attractive benefits on asset transmission, with favorable tax treaties and optimized estate planning.

optimization.title: Tax Optimization
optimization.details: Tailored strategies to optimize your tax burden and maximize your returns.

purchaseProcess.title: Property Purchase Process
purchaseProcess.details: Step-by-step guide for purchasing a property, including legal checks, the role of the notary, and expected timelines.

documents.title: Required Documents
documents.details: Essential documents such as tax identification (NIF), income proof, bank account details, and identification documents required for the property purchase.

rights.title: Rights and Obligations
rights.details: Overview of property rights and obligations, including tax responsibilities, maintenance duties, and co-ownership rules.

contracts.title: Contracts and Guarantees
contracts.details: Explanation of the various types of contracts, the legal guarantees provided, and key clauses to protect the buyer.

residentsGuide.title: Guide for Residents
residentsGuide.details: A detailed guide for residents covering administrative procedures, healthcare, education, and transportation options.

nonResidents.title: Non-Resident Information
nonResidents.details: Information for non-residents on managing property from abroad, including reporting obligations and remote management solutions.

adminSteps.title: Administrative Procedures
adminSteps.details: Step-by-step administrative procedures, such as consular registration, obtaining a driving license, and local tax obligations.

dailyLife.title: Daily Life in Portugal
dailyLife.details: Insights into daily life in Portugal, including cost of living, recommended neighborhoods, and cultural activities.

services_section.title: OUR SERVICES

services_section.renovationDescription: Turnkey service for renovation and decoration of your properties. We oversee all works from design to execution.

about.heroSubtitle: A passionate team serving your real estate projects since 2020
about.imageAlt: The L'Appartement team in a meeting discussing real estate projects in Lisbon
about.historyText1: L'Appartement, the concept-workshop around living spaces, was born in 2020 from the shared vision of Laure and Jean-Emmanuel. Upon moving to Portugal, they faced several challenges regarding the choice, renovation, and design of their home.
about.historyText2: Based on this observation, they naturally decided to combine their expertise to offer a unique service, enabling future project leaders to embark with confidence, with the advantage of having a single point of contact.
about.historyText3: Our mission is to provide a turnkey, personalized service tailored to the scale and specific needs of each project. This comprehensive approach allows us to simplify your processes while ensuring optimal project support.

founderLaure.name: Laure Fargeot
founderLaure.description: Project manager in Lisbon, I deliver tailor-made projects. An expert in design and renovation, I rely on a trusted network to support you at every stage, whether it is a personal or rental investment.
founderLaure.alt: Laure Fargeot - Co-Founder of L'Appartement, expert in real estate and renovation in Lisbon

founderJean.name: Jean-Emmanuel Salvado
founderJean.description: Commercial Director of Portuguese origin, I combine real estate expertise with a personalized approach. With my experience, I assist our clients in their search, administrative and legal advice, with tailor-made support.
founderJean.alt: Jean-Emmanuel Salvado - Co-Founder of L'Appartement, expert in real estate transactions in Lisbon

about.foundersQuote: “The satisfaction of our clients is our utmost priority, and we are proud of the trust you place in us. You are not just another client; you are an individual with unique goals and dreams. Because we understand you, we commit to making your journey to property ownership in Portugal smooth and serene.”
about.foundersSignature: Laure and Jean-Emmanuel, co-founders of L'Appartement

testimonial1.content: “Exceptional service from A to Z! The team guided us through the purchase and complete renovation of our apartment in Lisbon. Their local market expertise and network of qualified craftsmen made all the difference. The result exceeded our expectations.”
testimonial1.author: Sophie & Pierre

testimonial2.content: “A huge thank you to Laure and Jean-Emmanuel for their professionalism and responsiveness. They managed our rental investment from start to finish with remarkable efficiency. The detailed monthly reports allow us to monitor our investment with complete peace of mind.”
testimonial2.author: Marc & Julie

testimonial3.content: “A team that listens and is extremely professional. Their in-depth knowledge of the Lisbon real estate market enabled us to find the perfect property in record time. The renovation was carried out to perfection, within the agreed deadlines and budget.”
testimonial3.author: Laurent & Marie

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: L'Appartement ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
dataCollectionItems: Identification data: name, surname, email address, phone number
Communication data: messages, correspondence, contact preferences
Technical data: IP address, browser type, device used
Cookies: browsing data and preferences (see our cookie policy)
useOfDataItems: Manage your client file and real estate projects
Personalize your experience on our site
Send you marketing communications (with your consent)
privacyPolicy.legalBasisText: We process your data on the following legal bases:
legalBasisItems: Contract performance: for managing your real estate projects
Legal obligation: to comply with real estate regulations
Legitimate interest: to improve our services
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary for:
dataRetentionItems: The duration of our business relationship
privacyPolicy.yourRightsText: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
yourRightsItems: Right to access your personal data
Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
privacyPolicy.contactForRights: To exercise these rights, please contact us at
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:
privacyPolicy.dataTransfersText: Your data is processed primarily in Portugal and the EU. If we transfer your data outside the EU, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place in accordance with the GDPR.
privacyPolicy.policyChangesText: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon publication on our site. We will notify you of significant changes via email or on our website.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For any questions regarding this policy or your personal data, please contact our Data Protection Officer:

contactDetails.address: Rua do Sol ao Rato 69B, 1250-261 Lisboa, Portugal
